DOC.brief_title: DIFFICULT INTRAVENOUS ACCESS IN ADULTS ( VENSCORE )
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : To define difficult intravenous access score adult preoperative period Methods Multicenter , Observational prospective study Patients : patient > 18 year old , undergoing peripheral IV placement surgery operating room excision criterion : pregnant woman , induction anesthesia sevoflurane , Predictor variables include : history patient ( age , BMI , Fitzpatrick skin type , cancer , ICU stay , burn , diabetes , kidney disease , anxiety patient ... ) , operator experience characteristic ( year since graduation , year anesthesiology experience , IVs start per month ) , type catheter place catheterization ) , postcatheterization data ( success fist attempt yes , number total attempt success ... )
DOC.criteria: patient > 18 year old , undergoing peripheral IV placement surgery operating room patient refuse IV placement ; pregnant woman ; induction anesthesia sevoflurane without venous access place
